title: Introducing: Comic Con Meta*Pod
itunes:title: Introducing: Comic Con Meta*Pod
description:
Tune in to Comic Con Meta*Pod to hear celebrity interviews and catch up on the nerd news headlines. Hosts Hector Navarro and Joelle Monique guide you through the convention experience of discovering something new and exciting around every corner of the con floor. Each week features an eclectic mix of entertainment such as trivia battles, deep dives into fandoms with experts, and music tracks from celebrities & themed bands. From sci-fi, video games, anime, comic books, film & television, you’ll find the best in every genre in the Comic Con Meta*Pod.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
